long_description: From freestyle to all-mountain, the Salomon Lily snowboard boots are comfortable, precise, agile and warm-with a versatile, medium to mid-stiff flex. Women-specific liner construction provides personalized support and solid heel hold for narrow heels; liners are custom moldable for extra comfort. Zone Lock lacing system offers fluid, 1-pull tightening and secure lock-down for a natural flex and feel; zonal tightening offers a personalized fit. Toasty toes insulation keeps feet warm and comfortable on bitter cold days. Preshaped footbeds provide foot stabilization and arch support for improved pressure distribution; antimicrobial finish helps keep odors at bay. Empire sole design offers street shoe style without compromising performance; damping in heels and thinner forefoot area offer increased board feel.
